features: Complete internationalization across all modules (1,073 translations)
Support for 7 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Lithuanian, Portuguese, Italian
Reactive UI pattern for dynamic language switching without full page reload
All modal dialogs and notifications fully translated
Fixed hardcoded English strings in main app (13 locations)
Fixed AI ISA Assistant sidebar namespace issue
Complete Create SES module internationalization with reactive UI
Entry Point module navigation notifications in all languages
Clean project structure with organized codebase
Network Metrics Analysis Module with 7 centrality metrics
Interactive DataTable with all node metrics (sortable, searchable, filterable)
Network visualizations (bar plots, scatter plots, histograms with statistics)
Key node identification (Top 5 for each metric)
Comprehensive metrics guide with explanations and use cases
Confidence property system (1-5 scale) with visual feedback
About dialog with version and system information
